手机加密功能：（设置→安全→加密）

In Android M, google force device to be encrypted. You can use below change to make FDE disabled defaultly.

— a/fstab.qcom

+++ b/fstab.qcom

@@ -7,6 +7,6 @@ #<src> <mnt_point> <type> <mnt_flags and options> <fs_mgr_flags>

/dev/block/bootdevice/by-name/system /system ext4 ro,barrier=1,discard wait

-/dev/block/bootdevice/by-name/userdata /data ext4 nosuid,nodev,barrier=1,noauto_da_alloc,discard wait,check,forceencrypt=footer(表示默认开启)

+/dev/block/bootdevice/by-name/userdata /data ext4 nosuid,nodev,barrier=1,noauto_da_alloc,discard wait,check,encryptable=footer(表示默认关闭)

/devices/soc/74a4900.sdhci/mmc_host* /storage/sdcard1 vfat nosuid,nodev wait,voldmanaged=sdcard1:auto,encryptable=footer

/dev/block/zram0 none swap defaults zramsize=536870912

文件所在位置：device/qcom/project_name/fstab.qcom
